instructions.en:
1. Configure your base domain (eg: mydomain.com)
2. Configure the required environment variables
3. The system will generate a QR code to link WhatsApp
4. Visit https://mba.yourdomain.com to see the QR
5. Scan the QR with WhatsApp -> Linked devices
6. The API will be available at https://mba.yourdomain.com/api/whatsapp
